translation.en: [Ivy] Bean!
Where are you? You have to see this!
I'm in the tree house, Ivy!
Ghosts and swords, Bean! And an evil duke!
[Ivy] Giselle falls in love with a duke,
translation.es: Giselle se enamora de un duque, y él de ella,

translation.en: who likes her, but really, he's gonna marry a princess.
translation.es: Giselle se enamora de un duque, y él de ella, pero se casa con una princesa. Giselle muere de amor.

translation.en: So Giselle dies of a broken heart.
translation.es: pero se casa con una princesa. Giselle muere de amor.

translation.en: Ow, my heart. I'm dead now.
Her ghost goes into the forest
translation.es: Su fantasma va hacia el bosque

translation.en: and meets these other ghosts with broken hearts called the Wilis.
translation.es: junto a otros fantasmas despechados, las Willis.

translation.en: [all] You're mean, evil duke.
And they all surround the duke and dance him… to death.
translation.es: Todas rodean al duque y bailan hasta matarlo.

translation.en: -Taste my arabesque! -[Duke groans]
[both] I wanna be Giselle!
Oh. Okay. You be Giselle first.
Uh… You can be one of the Wilis. With extremely long fingernails.
translation.es: Puedes ser una de las Willis con uñas extremadamente largas.

translation.en: No, we need an evil duke, so you can kick his head off.
translation.es: No, necesitamos un duque malvado, así le arrancas la cabeza.

translation.en: But watch out, I… [exhales] …have a sword.
translation.es: Pero mira esto, tengo una espada.

translation.en: [Bean] Get away from me, Giselle ghost! -[Ivy screams] -[Bean grunts]
What that girl comes up with. [laughs] Typical Saturday Bean.
translation.es: - ¿Qué se les ocurrió ahora? - Un sábado al estilo de Beba.

translation.en: What is she supposed to be? -A superhero or something? -I…
-[Ivy] A-ha, evil duke! -[Bean grunts] [Ivy] My Wilis will get you!
More like a super-zero.
[Bean screams] Your dancing is too strong for me.
translation.es: Más bien superridícula. ¡Tu danza es demasiado para mí!

translation.en: [David] Nancy…
Get him, Wilis. Dance him to death.
translation.es: Vayan por él, Willis. Bailen hasta que muera.

translation.en: Keep back, or I'll sword you. I'll chop off your spinning little legs!
translation.es: Aléjense o las atravesaré. ¡Les cortaré las piernas!

translation.en: [Wilis] Dance you to death! Dance you to death! Dance you to death!
Now comes the part where I kick off your head!
Hey. Are you guys playing Wiffle ball?
Can I be pitcher?
Leo! Great.
You can be the duke, and Ivy and I can both be Giselles.
translation.es: Puedes ser el duque, y Eva y yo podemos ser Giselles.

translation.en: Giselles? What's that?
It's a ballet. Is there a uniform?
There are tights.
-See ya. -Don't be silly, Leo.
It's jumping and kicking as high as your head!
Poor Leo. He doesn't know that ballet is about dancing your enemies to death.
translation.es: Pobre Leo, no sabe que el ballet se trata de matar a tus enemigos bailando.

translation.en: Bean, what if we learned how to actually do ballet? For real.
translation.es: Beba, ¿y si vamos a aprender ballet? De verdad.

translation.en: Grandma sent you this? Aw, she was always trying to get me to dance.
translation.es: ¿La abuela te dio esto? Siempre quiso que yo bailara.

translation.en: -You didn't want to? -I have two left feet and zero rhythm.
But this is a great time for you to explore things
translation.es: Es genial que explores todo lo que quieras.

translation.en: that catch your interest, so ballet lessons it is.
translation.es: Es genial que explores todo lo que quieras. - Así que irás a clases de ballet. - ¡Sí!

translation.en: -Yes! -[gasps] That was so easy.
translation.es: - Así que irás a clases de ballet. - ¡Sí! - Qué fácil. - Solo tienes que preguntarle a tu mamá.

translation.en: You just have to ask your mom.
translation.es: - Qué fácil. - Solo tienes que preguntarle a tu mamá.

translation.en: And now that your mom has said yes, my mom has to, too.
translation.es: Como tu mamá dijo que sí, mi mamá está obligada.

translation.en: Absolutely not.
But ballet's my destiny.
Enough, Nancy. Pick up the bread, please.
Since when is ballet your destiny? Since today.
translation.es: - ¿Desde cuándo es tu destino? - Desde hoy.

translation.en: The best part is kicking off heads. Watch this.
translation.es: Lo mejor es que pateas cabezas. Miren.

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa, whoa! Careful, twinkle toes. -[Nancy] Ugh!
Bean, we're not spending money on something you'll quit in two weeks.
translation.es: No pagaré porque dejarás en dos semanas.

translation.en: [sighs] But I have to take lessons, Mom.
This is a great time to explore things that catch my interest.
translation.es: Es genial que exploremos las cosas que queremos.

translation.en: Didn't you tell me you had to take gymnastics?
And had to learn trumpet?
And had to play softball.
[David and Charlotte] Catch it, Bean!
You quit them all.
I won't quit ballet. I love ballet.
translation.es: No dejaré ballet. Me encanta el ballet.

translation.en: Of course, you'll quit. I bet you $5 you'll quit. Deal. Double deal.
translation.es: - Claro que dejarás. Te apuesto $5. - Redoblo la apuesta.

translation.en: Ten dollars. I won't quit, ever. Yes, you will.
translation.es: - Diez dólares. No dejaré nunca. - Sí lo harás.

translation.en: You won't even last learning all five positions. I barely did.
translation.es: No terminarás de aprender las cinco posiciones. Ni yo lo logré.

translation.en: Hang on. You let Nancy take ballet.
That's not fair. -That means you love her more than me. -Yeah.
translation.es: No es justo. La quieren más que a mí.

translation.en: -Love has nothing to do with it. -Please…
translation.es: - El amor no tiene nada que ver. - Por favor.

translation.en: Let her do it. I need the money.
-Okay, Bean, you can take ballet. -[pleading stops]
translation.es: Está bien, puedes ir a ballet.

translation.en: -Yay, yay, yay, yay, yay, yay! -Wait! On one condition.
Anything. You name it, Mom.
You may not quit. You have to stick it out for the full term.
translation.es: No puedes dejar. Tienes que ir todo el semestre.

translation.en: All the lessons. No quitting and no complaining.
translation.es: Sin faltar, sin dejar y sin quejarse.

translation.en: I promise, Mom, on an oath of spit.
translation.es: Mamá, te prometo con un juramento de saliva.

translation.en: Your promise is good enough. Go wash your hands. -Uh… Twice. -[Bean chuckles]
translation.es: - La promesa está bien. Lávate las manos. - Dos veces.

translation.en: [Bean] Yes!
Ballet? Well, it's better than tap.
Welcome to The Joyful School of Ballet.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la Gloriosa Escuela de Ballet.

translation.en: Seeing all your shining faces makes me smile.
translation.es: Me alegra ver esos rostros resplandecientes.

translation.en: I am not only your instructor, but I am also a fellow dancer myself.
translation.es: No solo soy su instructor, también soy bailarín.

translation.en: And why, you might ask, do I dance?
translation.es: Quizá se pregunten por qué bailo.

translation.en: -When I dance, my body and soul soars! -[mouthing]
translation.es: Cuando bailo, mi cuerpo y mi alma se elevan.

translation.en: I am your teacher, your maître de ballet, Mr. Joy.
translation.es: Soy su profesor, su maître de ballet, el Sr. Joy.

translation.en: But here, you will call me Monsieur Joie.
translation.es: Pero aquí, me llamarán Monsieur Joy.

translation.en: That is how my name is pronounced in la belle française.
translation.es: Así se pronuncia en la belle français,

translation.en: The birthplace of ballet. So here, I am Monsieur Joie, c'est moi.
translation.es: donde nació el ballet. Así que soy el Sr. Joy aquí, c'est moi.

translation.en: -Monsieur Ju-ah? -Joy. Joy means "Joie." -Joie? -Joie. Just watch my mouth.
translation.es: "Joy" quiere decir alegría. Copien mi pronunciación.

translation.en: Ju-Ju-Ju-Joie.
-Joie! -Like "wah-wah."
Joie. Joie.
Just do your best. [kids] Yes, Monsieur Joie!
Now, when I call your name,
translation.es: Ahora, a medida que los llame,

translation.en: please raise your hand.
[in heavy French accent] Eric?
[in heavy French accent] Eric?
Eric?
Emma?
Zuzu? Je m'appelle Zuzu, Monsieur Joie.
Je suis très impressed.
-Who are you? -We're in your class. Ivy and Bean.
Wha-wha-wha-wha… What are… What are you wearing?
It's an evil duke costume.
-For Giselle. -[kids laugh]
It hurts my eyeballs. Uh, please change now, mademoiselles.
translation.es: Me duelen los ojos. Por favor, cámbiense, mademoiselles.

translation.en: This is a ballet class, not a circus camp.
translation.es: Es una clase de ballet, no un circo.

translation.en: Maman, please.
-[in heavy French accent] Melanie. -[bright piano music playing]
Excellent, Monsieur Eric.
You are almost like a young me. Hmm.
translation.es: Casi te pareces a mí de pequeño.

translation.en: Almost.
[whispers] How are you so good? -[Ivy] You're so clumsy. -I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo eres tan bueno si eres muy torpe? - No sé.

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie] Grand battement, plié. -[groans]
[Monsieur Joie] Good.
Beaucoup, beaucoup, beaucoup. Wonderful.
Monsieur Joie, can I ask you a question?
-Yes. -When do we start kicking heads off?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Cuándo pateamos cabezas y hacemos el ballet divertido?

translation.en: When do we do the fun ballet?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo pateamos cabezas y hacemos el ballet divertido?

translation.en: What is the… "fun ballet"?
Like in Giselle. Sword fights, broken-hearted killer ghosts.
translation.es: Como en Giselle. Pelea de espadas, fantasmas.

translation.en: Oh, that fun ballet.
Hmm. Peut-être after you learn the basics.
translation.es: Peut-être después de aprender lo básico.

translation.en: -I'd say four or five minute-- -[gasps] Years!
translation.es: Yo diría que en cuatro o cinco… ¡años!

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie laughs] -[whispers] Years?
[Monsieur Joie] All together now.
Again!
Tendu, grand battement, grand battement, plié--
translation.es: Tendu, grand battement, grand battement, plié…

translation.en: Ah! Ah! Oh, wow. What… What is this?
My mom says that I should dance like no one's watching.
translation.es: Mi mamá dice que debo bailar como si nadie me viera.

translation.en: Yes, well, I can understand why she'd tell you that.
translation.es: Entiendo por qué te lo dice.

translation.en: On… the… beat, mademoiselle!
On the beat!
Here, I'll show her, Monsieur Joie. Like this, Ivy.
translation.es: Yo le muestro, Sr. Joy. Así, Eva.

translation.en: [in French accent] No. No. No, no, no, no, no, no. No!
-Without the music. -[piano stops]
Okay, imagine… you are a gazelle.
translation.es: Bien, imagina que eres una gacela.

translation.en: Giselle? With the duke and ghostly Wilis?
No! No! Gazelle, the animal.
Racing across the African plains, gracefully extending your limbs.
translation.es: Corriendo por las llanuras de África, extendiendo sus miembros con gracia.

translation.en: -[Ivy grunts] -Okay.
-[kids laughing] -[Monsieur Joie] Okay! All right, all right! We're gonna forget the gazelle, and we're going to march.
-[rhythmic music plays] -March. Knees up and march.
[in rhythmic tone] Not you. You are ballet students.
translation.es: Ustedes no. Ustedes son alumnos de ballet.

translation.en: Just Ivy's marching, and apparently Bean.
translation.es: Solo marchará Eva y, por lo que veo, Beba.

translation.en: I was the worst. Everyone laughed. I never want to go back.
translation.es: Fui la peor. Todos se rieron. No quiero volver nunca más.

translation.en: Me neither. Ballet is not our destiny, Ivy.
translation.es: Yo tampoco. El ballet no es nuestro destino.

translation.en: It is our despair.
[Nancy] Mom, 13 is so far away.
[Charlotte] It's not that far away.
Nancy, could you just slow down a little bit?
I'm in seventh grade. Seventh, Mom. We're converting fractions to decimals.
translation.es: Estoy en séptimo grado, mamá. Convertimos fracciones en decimales.

translation.en: We're studying puberty. Sixth graders aren't doing that.
translation.es: Estudiamos la pubertad. No es sexto, ni cuarto.

translation.en: Fourth graders aren't, but there are plenty of them who have earrings.
translation.es: Estudiamos la pubertad. No es sexto, ni cuarto. - Pero muchos ya tienen aretes. - Por favor, Nancy.

translation.en: [Charlotte] Nancy, please.
translation.es: - Pero muchos ya tienen aretes. - Por favor, Nancy.

translation.en: Hi, girls. How was ballet?
You gonna quit?
It was great. -Yes, so much fun. -[sighs]
-[kid's mom] Hi, Charlotte! -Impossible. No way. You hated it.
I bet Monsieur Joie ate you alive.
Nope. We loved it.
He loved us.
The word "gazelle" was used. We are the stars of the class.
translation.es: Usó la palabra gacela. Somos las estrellas de la clase.

translation.en: Let's change the bet. Double or nothing.
translation.es: Cambiemos la apuesta. Doble o nada.

translation.en: Twenty dollars that says no way are you two dorks ever gonna be the stars.
translation.es: $20 a que dos tontas como ustedes no serán las protagonistas.

translation.en: -Girls! -Prepare to be totally broke.
Actually, I'm preparing to be rich.
translation.es: De hecho, me preparo para ser rica.

translation.en: Twenty dollars is mine.
-Nancy, please. This car is not a casino. -[sighs]
translation.es: Nancy, por favor, el auto no es un casino.

translation.en: What are you boys up to? We just ran a marathon.
Our third this year.
[Ivy] This is our only hope.
A spell won't help. I had to promise I wouldn't quit.
translation.es: Un hechizo no ayudará. Prometí que no dejaría.

translation.en: Listen to this. Forgetfulness spell.
-[Bean groans] -Turn back time and erase the past.
translation.es: ¿"Regresa en el tiempo y borra el pasado"?

translation.en: If we do this right,
they won't even remember we talked about ballet or that they paid for it.
translation.es: no recordarán que hablamos de ballet, ni que pagaron.

translation.en: Bean, do you want to take capoeira lessons?
It's been so long since you've taken any kind of lessons, anywhere.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no tomas clases de nada.

translation.en: [Bean] Perfect!
Mom will forget my promise, and Nancy will forget the bet. What do we need?
translation.es: Mamá no recordará mi promesa ni Nancy la apuesta. ¿Qué necesitamos?

translation.en: First up… ten dead flies.
[Katrine] Thank you so much. My pleasure. My pleasure. You know, I remember…
Ready?
[Katrine] Oh, no!
I'm like, "How you gonna make it fluffy?" How is it even gonna be thick?
translation.es: Dije: "¿Cómo se aireará?". ¿Cómo se engrosará? Si le pones almendras…

translation.en: If you're gonna put almond--
translation.es: ¿Cómo se engrosará? Si le pones almendras…

translation.en: I think ballet broke my knee bone, Mom.
translation.es: Creo que me quebré la rodilla en ballet.

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Oh. -[Bean] It's all purple.
-Did you paint your knee? -[clicks tongue] No.
Rose and nettle, flies and leaf, erase the past, relieve our grief! -[gasps] -[Charlotte] Ooh!
translation.es: Rosa y ortiga, moscas y hojas, borra el pasado, ¡libéranos de esta pena!

translation.en: [Katrine] Ivy! Are you throwing flies at me?
Do you remember what day it is?
Yes. It is the day that you threw dead insects and leaf bits into our dinner.
translation.es: Sí. El día en el que me arrojaste insectos muertos y hojas en la cena.

translation.en: Can you tell me the name of your favorite anthropologist?
translation.es: ¿Puedes decirme quién es tu antropólogo favorito?

translation.en: Can you tell me the name of what we're gonna eat now?
translation.es: ¿Y tú puedes decirme qué comeremos hoy?

translation.en: Do you remember a promise
I made a long time ago?
translation.es: que te hice hace mucho tiempo?

translation.en: Last week? When you agreed to stick with ballet?
translation.es: ¿La que hiciste la semana pasada sobre no dejar ballet?

translation.en: [sighs] Dang. Some spell.
Did you put a spell on us?
Why?
Because we want to quit ballet. It was awful.
translation.es: Porque queremos dejar ballet. Fue espantoso.

translation.en: I was awful.
I thought it'd be fun, but everyone laughed.
translation.es: Creí que sería divertido, pero todos se rieron.

translation.en: Honey. You don't have to take ballet.
translation.es: Cariño, no tienes que ir a ballet.

translation.en: If it's not for you, just… just stop.
translation.es: Si no es para ti, no vayas más.

translation.en: You're not mad? No, of course not.
I want you to explore things,
so you can find out what you are and aren't passionate about.
translation.es: para que descubras qué te apasiona y qué no.

translation.en: Hmm. You did discover something. You discovered that ballet wasn't for you.
translation.es: Ya descubriste algo, que el ballet no es para ti.

translation.en: [giggles] Come here.
Don't even think about it.
Mom, you're so unfair. Ivy's mom let her quit.
translation.es: Eres injusta. La mamá de Eva le permite dejar.

translation.en: Well, I'm not Ivy's mom. Moms are different just the way kids are different.
translation.es: No soy su mamá. Somos distintas como ustedes.

translation.en: But I'm not different from Ivy. I also discovered ballet isn't for me, so how come I can't quit?
translation.es: Soy igual a Eva. El ballet no es para mí, ¿por qué tengo que ir?

translation.en: [Charlotte] Aside from the fact that you made a promise?
Because I want you to learn how to stick with something, Bean.
translation.es: Quiero que aprendas a ser constante.

translation.en: Ballet is hard.
But if you work at it and persevere, you might discover you're good at it.
translation.es: Si ensayas y perseveras, quizá descubras que te gusta.

translation.en: Or die of boredom. It happens, you know.
translation.es: Si ensayas y perseveras, quizá descubras que te gusta. O puedo morirme de aburrimiento.

translation.en: Or learn to like it.
Either way, I think you'll survive. -[groans] -[Charlotte] You may even thank me.
translation.es: Igualmente, sobrevivirás y hasta me lo agradecerás.

translation.en: Come on. Now, go take a bath. No, you made me take a bath yesterday.
translation.es: - Ve a bañarte. - No. Me obligaste a bañarme ayer.

translation.en: [David] Bean, straight to bed. Lights out in ten minutes.
translation.es: Beba, directo a la cama. Apaga las luces en 10 minutos.

translation.en: -[radio static] -[Ivy] Wanda Rich reporting for duty. What's your 20, Grizzly Girl?
translation.es: Bruja Maravilla se reporta. ¿Dónde estás, Osa Parda?

translation.en: -[Bean sighs] -[Ivy] Grizzly Girl? Are you there?
translation.es: Bruja Maravilla se reporta. ¿Dónde estás, Osa Parda? Osa Parda, ¿estás ahí?

translation.en: Bean!
-Bean? -[Bean] I'm here. In a not good mood.
My life is ruined. She really won't let you quit?
translation.es: - Mi vida se arruinó. - ¿No te permite dejar?

translation.en: [sighs] Nope. I even tried to cry. She just told me to stop drooling.
translation.es: No, hasta intenté llorar. Me dijo que dejara de babear.

translation.en: This is bad.
If you have to do ballet, I think I have to do it too.
translation.es: Si debes ir a ballet, tendré que ir contigo.

translation.en: No, you don't.
I was the one who got you into this. It was all my idea.
translation.es: Yo te metí en esto. Fue mi idea.

translation.en: Are you sure? What if you fall, like, a hundred times?
translation.es: ¿Estás segura? ¿Y si te caes como 100 veces?

translation.en: I won't quit.
What if you twirl so much your toes bleed in your ballet shoes
translation.es: ¿Y si giras tanto que te sangran los dedos

translation.en: and get scabs that fall off and bleed even more?
translation.es: y se te hacen costras que te sangran aún más?

translation.en: I still won't quit. [sighs] What if kids laugh at you?
translation.es: - Aun así, no dejaré. - ¿Y si los niños se ríen de ti?

translation.en: I'll have to endure.
I guess we're doomed, Ivy.
You and me.
Doomed to dance.
[Monsieur Joie] Group un.
Very good.
Group deux.
Group trois.
Group Ivy and Bean.
-[grunts] -[Monsieur Joie] Oh, no. No, no, no.
-[grunting] -[Monsieur Joie] Oh, mademoiselles.
[Monsieur Joie] Lovely, Zuzu.
-Remember, we are what? -[Bean grunting]
Gazelles!
[Monsieur Joie] All right, mes enfants. Settle down. Settle down.
-[banging] -Marvelous news.
This year, for the first time, we are not doing a little recital here in the studio.
translation.es: Este año, no haremos una gala pequeña en la escuela,

translation.en: Instead, we are taking part in A Festival of Movement.
translation.es: sino que formaremos parte del Festival de Movimiento.

translation.en: A Dance Delirium in 26 Acts.
translation.es: Un Delirio de Danza de 26 actos.

translation.en: Which is why I have chosen something très unique for this performance.
translation.es: Por eso, elegí algo très especial para nuestra presentación.

translation.en: Something with magic and suspense.
For this is a story of two magical creatures who fall in love.
translation.es: Porque es una historia de dos criaturas mágicas que se enamoran.

translation.en: A mermaid…
-Zuzu. -[gasps] Yes!
-Yes! -And a seahorse, Eric.
translation.es: - ¡Sí! - Y un caballito de mar, Eric.

translation.en: It is called Wedding Beneath the Sea.
translation.es: Se llamará Boda bajo el mar.

translation.en: -Eric? -There's not any kissy stuff, is there?
translation.es: ¿Eric? - No habrá besos y esas cosas, ¿verdad? - No.

translation.en: [in French accent] No. No, no, no, no.
translation.es: - No habrá besos y esas cosas, ¿verdad? - No.

translation.en: Well, oui, oui.
No. No, no, no, no.
Your… Your… Your emotions are expressed through the artistry of dance.
translation.es: Sus emociones se expresan a través del arte de la danza.

translation.en: -Say it with me. When I dance… -My body and soul soars?
translation.es: - Repitan. Cuando bailo… - ¿Mi cuerpo y mi alma se elevan?

translation.en: My body and soul soars. Yes, Zuzu. Merci.
translation.es: Mi cuerpo y mi alma se elevan. Sí, Zuzu. Merci.

translation.en: Emma, you are a tropical fish who marries them. -Oh, yes. -Oh my!
translation.es: Emma, tú serás el pez tropical que los casará.

translation.en: The rest of you are wedding guests. You bring presents. You dance. -You tra-la-la. -[kids giggle]
translation.es: El resto serán los invitados a la boda. Traerán regalos y bailarán.

translation.en: Monsieur Joie?
What do Bean and I do?
[groans] Yes, you two.
You'll be delighted to know I have taken on the choreographic challenge.
I have taken your erratic… What would you even call… Movements.
translation.es: He aceptado sus erráticos… ¿Cómo podrían describirse? Movimientos,

translation.en: And transmuted them into art.
-You will be friendly squid. -[kids giggling]
Standing guard
at the very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very edge of the stage.
translation.es: que se quedan parados bien al costado del escenario.

translation.en: Like so, your tentacles waving on the passing tide,
translation.es: Así, sus tentáculos se menean con la marea,

translation.en: ensuring the success of the wedding.
translation.es: asegurando el éxito de la boda.

translation.en: -Friendly squid? -They're just happy to be there.
translation.es: ¿Calamares? Están felices de estar allí. La invitación era sin niños ni calamares.

translation.en: The invitation strictly said no babies and no squid.
translation.es: Están felices de estar allí. La invitación era sin niños ni calamares.

translation.en: Oh! Best of all, this year's performance takes place at…
translation.es: Están felices de estar allí. La invitación era sin niños ni calamares. Lo mejor de todo es que la gala de este año se hará

translation.en: -The Burroughs Theater. -[kids gasp] Which seats 300 people.
translation.es: en el Teatro Burroughs, con capacidad para 300 personas.

translation.en: It's not that I want to be like everyone else. It's just… Earrings are fun, Mom.
translation.es: No es que quiera pertenecer. Es que los aretes son lindos, mamá.

translation.en: -They feel like me. -[chuckles]
I said the same thing to your grandma when I was your age. I wanted to dye my hair green.
translation.es: Le dije lo mismo a tu abuela cuando quería teñirme el pelo de verde.

translation.en: Green?
[softly] Yeah.
Did she let you?
No, she did not.
-[Bean sighs] -[Charlotte] Ivy? Bean? What's the matter?
[sighs] Nothing.
Oh, honey. You sure? You look like you actually hurt your knee bone this time.
translation.es: ¿Segura? Parece que te quebraste la rodilla de verdad.

translation.en: -Can we just go, please? -Bonjour, Madame.
[chuckles] Hi, Harold. It's "Monsieur Joie."
-Monsieur Joie. -Ah.
-How are these two doing? -We… Oh, yes… They're…. They're, um…
translation.es: - ¿Cómo bailan las niñas? - Bueno, es que… Son…

translation.en: I've never had budding little dancers who are… who are quite so…
translation.es: Nunca había tenido alumnas de baile tan…

translation.en: You know, I don't think that there's a word for it in French.
translation.es: No creo que haya una palabra en francés.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -And they forgot their announcements. -The big recital. -[Ivy sighs]
translation.es: Se olvidaron los folletos sobre la gran gala.

translation.en: Bye, Harold.
A recital will be great.
I bet you have fun parts.
Yeah. Fun parts as the stars of the show, right?
translation.es: - Seguro harán algo divertido. - Sí. Seguro son las estrellas del espectáculo, ¿no?

translation.en: That's right, Nancy.
translation.es: Exacto. Estamos en todas las escenas.

translation.en: -We're in every scene. -Really?
translation.es: Exacto. Estamos en todas las escenas. - ¿En serio? - Hay muchos bailarines nuevos.

translation.en: [Charlotte] You got some new dancers this year.
You're the two friendly squid?
That is so embarrassing.
Nancy, could you be nice to your sister, just once?
translation.es: Nancy, ¿puedes ser buena con tu hermana por una vez?

translation.en: I am nice.
I cannot wait to see Bean as the friendly squid.
translation.es: No veo la hora de ver a Beba como el calamar amigable.

translation.en: No one's gonna laugh, Bean. Everybody is going to be very proud.
translation.es: Nadie se reirá. Todos estarán orgullosos.

translation.en: -[soft chuckle] -Buckle up.
Eric, honey, you were supposed to paint the fish, not yourself.
translation.es: Debías pintar el pez, no a ti mismo.

translation.en: [Eric] Sorry.
Okay. Ten more minutes, class, then we'll hang your fish prints on the wall.
translation.es: Diez minutos más y colgaremos los peces.

translation.en: Please get these permission slips signed by your parents as soon as possible, otherwise you won't be able to go on the field trip.
translation.es: Traigan esto firmado por sus padres o no podrán ir a la excursión.

translation.en: -[giggling] -What's so funny?
Nothing, just your fish printing. [chuckles]
translation.es: De nada, de tu pez de molde.

translation.en: Zuzu said you guys are gonna be like this fish at your recital.
translation.es: Zuzu dice que ustedes serán como estos peces en la gala.

translation.en: A flop.
Why do you care? You're not even coming.
I'm coming with my sister.
We both love ballet.
Who else is going to the dance festival?
translation.es: ¿Quién más irá al festival de danza?

translation.en: I am, Paisley.
[Ms. Aruba-Tate] Dance festival?
[kid 1] I didn't know you can dance, Ivy.
No way.
Don't worry. They're coming to watch dancing. Not wiggling.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Quieren ver baile, no un meneo.

translation.en: And definitely not wiggling, friendly squid. [chuckles]
translation.es: Definitivamente no un calamar que se menea.

translation.en: I might be there for the wiggling, friendly squid.
translation.es: Quizá yo vaya a ver el meneo de los calamares.

translation.en: What exactly is a squid? It has ink, right?
-And weird tentacle arms. -[kids laugh]
Okay, class, who wants the horseshoe crab? -[kid 3] I do! I do! It's an arthropod, a living fossil.
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere al cangrejo herradura? Es un artrópodo, un fósil viviente.

translation.en: -Yeah? -[Emma] Thanks, Ms. Aruba-Tate.
And then there's this little invertebrate. A squid!
[Ms. Aruba-Tate] All yours, Dusit.
[in silly voice] I'm doing ballet. I'm so silly.
I'm Ivy and Bean.
[Ivy sighs] That was just the beginning, Bean. The whole school will be laughing at us.
translation.es: Fue solo el principio. Toda la escuela se reirá de nosotras.

translation.en: Nancy, too. She'll see we're not the stars of the show, and she'll get $20.
translation.es: Nancy también. Verá que no somos las estrellas, y tendré que darle los $20.

translation.en: I'll have to do chores forever to pay that.
translation.es: Tendré que trabajar mucho para pagarle.

translation.en: There has to be some way out of this. Nothing's impossible.
translation.es: Tiene que haber una salida. Nada es imposible.

translation.en: Being good at ballet is impossible.
translation.es: Ser buena en el ballet es imposible.

translation.en: Yeah.
But it wouldn't be impossible to break our legs.
translation.es: Pero no es imposible quebrarse las piernas.

translation.en: [Bean] Ivy, we shouldn't do this.
[sighs] You know, when Eric broke his arm, the first time,
translation.es: Cuando Eric se quebró el brazo por primera vez

translation.en: you could almost see his bone sticking out.
translation.es: se le veía el hueso afuera.

translation.en: -Maybe breaking is a very bad idea. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.es: Quizá quebrarnos no sea buena idea.

translation.en: How about
spraining?
Au revoir, recital!
Toodle-oo tentacles!
[both] This is a bad idea!
Probably just a bruise would work.
-Huh? -We look like idiots.
Squidiots.
-Oh. -There's not enough tentacles. There's supposed to be ten.
translation.es: No tenemos muchos tentáculos. Debemos tener diez.

translation.en: -Are you sure it's not eight? -Ten.
translation.es: - Creo que son ocho. - No, diez.

translation.en: They're ten-tacles.
Oh. No complaining. Because you girls…
look great.
[Katrine] It's, um…
-[David] What do you think? -Very squid-like.
-Mmm-hmm. -[David] Right?
-Uh-huh. -So cute. Don't lie, Mom. You're laughing.
translation.es: - Muy lindas. - No mientas, mamá. Te estás riendo.

translation.en: -No. [laughs] -No. -I choked on a cracker. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.es: No, me atoré con una galleta.

translation.en: [Katrine] You know what would make this? If we did something around the neck with like a scarf?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué falta? Algo alrededor del cuello, ¿un pañuelo?

translation.en: -Or, um, what about a bow tie? -Bow tie, yes.
The problem is there's not enough tentacles.
-And more tentacles, definitely. -[Katrine] Mmm-hmm.
-[Charlotte] And some suction cups. -[Katrine] Yes.
You can't be serious. There's not enough tentacles.
translation.es: - ¿Es una broma? - No tenemos suficientes tentáculos.

translation.en: The number of tentacles is definitely the problem.
translation.es: Sin dudas, ese es el problema.

translation.en: [Nancy] I can't wait to see this.
Stars of the show.
[David] She's just jealous. -You girls are gonna be great. -[Bean] Hmm.
There's got to be some way not to do this besides breaking bones.
translation.es: Debe haber una forma de no ir sin quebrarnos.

translation.en: Are you sure you haven't figured out that invisibility spell?
I don't think any spell can help us now.
Maybe we can just hide ourselves up in the tree house
translation.es: Quizá podemos escondernos en la casa del árbol

translation.en: with ten years of supplies?
They'd probably just cut it down and make us go.
translation.es: Seguro la tirarían abajo y nos obligarían a ir.

translation.en: Mmm, maybe we should just run away?
I love running away. Where should we go?
What about the park? -There's a policeman with a dog. -[door opens]
translation.es: - ¿Al parque? - Hay un policía con un perro.

translation.en: -He smells you. -[David] Bye, Katrine.
-[Katrine] Thanks for the costumes. -[David] You're welcome.
translation.es: - Gracias por los disfraces. - De nada.

translation.en: -[Charlotte] See you tomorrow. -[Katrine] Dinner in a half-hour, Ivy.
translation.es: - Hasta mañana. - Cenamos en media hora.

translation.en: I signed your permission slip for the aquarium. Don't forget to put it in your bag.
translation.es: Firmé el permiso para el acuario. Ponla en tu mochila.

translation.en: [gasps] I can't believe we didn't see this.
translation.es: DÍA: 21 DE JUNIO No puedo creer que no vimos esto. ¡Lee!

translation.en: Read!
translation.es: No puedo creer que no vimos esto. ¡Lee!

translation.en: "Permission to go to the aquarium." It's the same day as the recital.
translation.es: - "Permiso para ir al acuario". - Es el día de la gala.

translation.en: We can run away and hide at the aquarium.
By the time they find us, the dance festival will be over.
translation.es: Para cuando nos encuentren, la gala ya habrá terminado.

translation.en: [both] Yes!
Come on, Ivy! [whooping]
Watch for cars.
Be careful. Cross the street. Come on.
Our new home.
The minute no one's watching, we'll find a place to hide.
translation.es: Cuando nadie nos vea, nos esconderemos.

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come on, keep up. [Ivy and Bean] Coming!
I don't want to lose you.
[announcer] Welcome to the aquarium.
What's in your backpacks?
None of your beeswax.
I brought fish chum for the sharks. I wanna see a feeding frenzy.
translation.es: Traje carnada para los tiburones. Quiero que enloquezcan.

translation.en: -[Emma gasps] -[Dusit] It's gonna be carnage.
Could I throw some? -I'd love to see a feeding frenzy. -Ugh!
-[Emma] And I love sharks. -[Bean] How about down there?
Okay, listen up everyone. Come here, please. Come on.
translation.es: - Adoro los tiburones. - ¿Y allí abajo? Atención. Vengan, por favor. Vamos.

translation.en: -Come here. -[Eric] Whoa! This place is great.
Ivy, Bean, come up with the rest of us, please.
translation.es: Eva, Beba, vengan con el resto, por favor.

translation.en: We're gonna stay on the first floor today, all right? Find your field trip buddy.
translation.es: Nos quedaremos en el primer piso. Busquen a su compañero.

translation.en: Eric, Paisley couldn't make it. So, you and Vanessa should buddy up today.
translation.es: Eric, Vanessa y tú deberían estar juntos.

translation.en: -[Eric] Yes, miss. -Let's go!
[kids] Yes, Ms. Aruba-Tate!
Are there any sharks here?
Even just one great white? Or any other color will do.
translation.es: Uno blanco bien grande, o de otro color está bien.

translation.en: Dusit, we're gonna hand this over to our expert guide. -And we'll get questions after, okay? -[class] Whoa!
translation.es: Dusit, nuestro guía experto hablará y, luego, haremos preguntas.

translation.en: The sea lions, who call this tank home, are faster than any other type of seal.
translation.es: Los lobos marinos que viven en este tanque son las focas más rápidas.

translation.en: -[kid 2] Wow, look at that! -[kid 3] Whoa!
translation.es: Los lobos marinos que viven en este tanque son las focas más rápidas. ¡Guau! ¡Miren eso!

translation.en: They can move at 25 miles per hour, which helps them feed on sardines.
translation.es: Nadan a 40 kilómetros por hora y se alimenten con sardinas.

translation.en: -[kid 4] Oh, they're beautiful! -But they also love to play not with…. sharks so much, but they are very good surfers.
translation.es: También adoran jugar, no con tiburones, y son muy buenos surfeando.

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Eric, don't touch the glass, please.
-We don't want any accidents. -Bean. We gotta go.
[Ms. Aruba-Tate] Dusit, put away the fish chum, please.
Whoa. That could be where we hide out.
This is perfect.
[Bean] It's so private. I call this one!
translation.es: Es muy privado. - ¡Este es mío! - Y este, mío.

translation.en: [Ivy] This one's mine.
What just happened? I don't know.
Try and find a light.
Okay. There's gotta be one somewhere.
Hmm. Nothing.
[gasps] I found something!
[Bean] Whoa, Nelly!
[aquarium narrator] The ocean is full of many mysteries…
translation.es: El océano está lleno de misterios,

translation.en: -Whoa. -…but none quite as mysterious as the creatures of the deep.
translation.es: pero nada es tan misterioso como las criaturas de las profundidades.

translation.en: [Bean] Ivy?
I get it. This shows what life is like at the bottom of the sea.
translation.es: Entiendo. El espectáculo muestra la vida abajo del mar.

translation.en: Oh, look.
[aquarium narrator] Prepare to be amazed.
What the heck is that?
[aquarium narrator] The extraordinary anglerfish has a luminous spine
translation.es: El extraordinario rape tiene una columna luminosa

translation.en: that lures victims into its sharp teeth.
translation.es: que atrae víctimas a sus dientes filosos.

translation.en: I think I'd rather do the recital. -Me too! -[both whimper]
translation.es: - Prefiero ir a la gala. - ¡Yo también!

translation.en: [aquarium narrator] In these black waters lurks the dragon of the deep,
translation.es: En estas aguas oscuras, acecha el dragón de lo profundo,

translation.en: the giant squid.
-[Bean gasps] -[aquarium narrator] It watches and waits… ready to strike.
translation.es: Observa y espera, listo para atacar.

translation.en: Are you brave enough to face its tentacles?
There they are. Thank you.
Ivy, Bean, where were you? I was so worried.
translation.es: ¿Dónde se habían metido? Estaba muy preocupada.

translation.en: -We got scared. -We got really scared.
Oh, no. Because you were lost?
Ye-yes. Lo-lost.
You poor things. I'm so sorry.
-It's okay. You're safe now. -Hmm. I told you they weren't dead.
translation.es: - Tranquilas. Están bien. - No estaban muertas.

translation.en: I didn't say dead. I said, "Probably eaten by a sea lion."
translation.es: No dije eso. Dije que las había comido un lobo marino.

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] It's okay. You're here and safe.
translation.es: Calma. Ya están aquí, a salvo.

translation.en: -[Ivy and Bean] Thanks, Ms. Aruba-Tate. -[sighs]
We got to see the eels, and you didn't. They're freaky scary.
translation.es: Fuimos a ver las anguilas, y ustedes no. Son aterradoras.

translation.en: Not as intimidating as a giant squid.
translation.es: No tanto como el calamar gigante.

translation.en: It had this freaky big eye that hypnotized us.
translation.es: Tiene un ojo enorme que hipnotiza.

translation.en: Bean, a squid can't hypnotize people.
[Leo] There is not a giant squid in here.
Nobody has a giant squid.
Giant squid? How did you guys get to the Creatures of the Deep room?
That's on a totally different floor. -Ivy? -Uh…
Did you get lost on purpose?
Um… Well… So, I thought--
It was kind of my fault, Ms. Aruba-Tate. Don't blame Ivy.
translation.es: Fue mi culpa, Srta. Aruba-Tate. Eva no tuvo la culpa.

translation.en: We started off a little lost, and then I said, "Let's go this way."
translation.es: Nos perdimos un poco, y después le dije: "Vamos por aquí".

translation.en: But it was the wrong way.
translation.es: Pero no era el camino correcto.

translation.en: So, I said, "Here are some stairs that we can go down together."
translation.es: Entonces, le dije: "¿Por qué no bajamos estas escaleras?".

translation.en: Thank you again for everything. You're welcome. Bye.
translation.es: - Gracias por todo. - De nada. Adiós.

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] We're gonna be leaving in a minute.
Yes!
Ivy, Bean, if I can't trust you two to behave safely and responsibly,
translation.es: Eva, Beba, si no se comportan de manera segura y responsable,

translation.en: you realize I won't be able to take you on any future field trips.
translation.es: no podré llevarlas a futuras excursiones.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Ms. Aruba-Tate.
I am too. Really sorry. Really.
translation.es: Yo también lo siento, de verdad.

translation.en: I know you can help each other do better when it comes to things like this.
I also know you can help each other do great things.
translation.es: Se ayudarán a lograr muchas cosas.

translation.en: Eric told me that you're all performing in a dance recital tonight.
translation.es: Eric me contó que bailarán en una gala esta noche.

translation.en: I'm really looking forward to it.
translation.es: No veo la hora de verlas.

translation.en: [driver] All right, kids. Please take your seats.
[announcer] Welcome, one and all, to tonight's Dance Delirium.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al Delirio de Danza de esta noche.

translation.en: -A Festival of Movement in 26 Acts. -[laughing]
translation.es: Un Festival de Movimiento de 26 actos.

translation.en: -You will be delighted, amazed, and… -Twenty-six acts?
I hate how they design these recitals to go on forever.
Oh, I… I mean, not yours, honey. You were great.
translation.es: No me refiero a la tuya, cariño. Fue fabulosa.

translation.en: No, no, it's fine. This is gonna be great.
translation.es: Está bien. Esta gala será genial.

translation.en: Great for me. Twenty dollars is mine.
translation.es: Genial para mí que ganaré 20 dólares.

translation.en: There's no way these squidiots are gonna be stars of the show.
translation.es: Es imposible que las supertontas sean estrellas.

translation.en: [festival announcer] Please take your seats.
Act 14 will start in one minute.
translation.es: El acto 14 comenzará en un minuto.

translation.en: [whispering] Five.
Ten.
Fifteen.
Twenty.
[Monsieur Joie] Securing rope. Almost ready.
Standing by.
Standing by. Raise.
translation.es: Espera. Súbela con fuerza, Maman. No tenemos todo el día.

translation.en: Put some muscle into it, Maman. We don't have all day.
translation.es: Súbela con fuerza, Maman. No tenemos todo el día.

translation.en: Whale ascending! Whale ascending.
You guys like my fins?
Like a real fish.
[Monsieur Joie] Put your back into it, Maman.
You guys do look, uh, friendly,
which is good because in the program it does say that you are friendly squids.
translation.es: Genial, porque, según el programa, son los calamares amigables.

translation.en: I don't think Monsieur Joie has seen a real squid.
translation.es: El profesor nunca vio un calamar de verdad.

translation.en: A real giant squid is not friendly at all.
translation.es: Los calamares gigantes no son para nada amigables.

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Who has the glitter? The glitter is très important!
Where are my stars? Where are my stars?
Where are you?
-[Monsieur Joie] Then, now I can focus. -Oh, no. You really can't dance with those tentacles.
translation.es: Ay, no. No pueden bailar con esos tentáculos.

translation.en: Which, when you think about it is, well, probably a good thing.
translation.es: Pensándolo bien, es mucho mejor así.

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie] You are the fish. -Hmm.
[Monsieur Joie] Feel the water. See the coral.
translation.es: Sientan el agua. Vean el coral.

translation.en: Oh. Mademoiselles Bean and Ivy. Well, you certainly are, um… well-tentacled.
translation.es: Mademoiselles Beba y Eva. Sin dudas, están llenas de tentáculos.

translation.en: Uh, just please don't knock down the set.
translation.es: Por favor, no tiren la escenografía.

translation.en: Places! Places! 14th act! That's us!
-Tout de suite! That means get on stage! -[kid] Go, go. [Monsieur Joie] Get on stage!
translation.es: Tout suite! ¡Significa que vayan al escenario ya!

translation.en: [announcer] Please take your seats. Act 14 is about to commence.
translation.es: Tomen sus asientos. Comienza el acto 14.

translation.en: Amanda, look! [chuckles]
So talented.
-Is that really Bean and Ivy? -So goofy.
[Ivy] Put your arms up.
-[Bean] Look, Ivy, over here! Quickly! -[Ivy] Ah!
[Bean] Spin, spin, spin!
Twenty dollars.
You're right, Ivy. A real squid is the opposite of friendly.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Los calamares son lo opuesto a amigables.

translation.en: A real squid would never just stand around wiggling.
A real squid just lurks in the shadows
until it's time to attack, like the Wilis in Giselle.
translation.es: hasta que es hora de atacar, como las Willis en Giselle.

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care about a stupid bet with a stupid big sister.
translation.es: No le importa la apuesta con su tonta hermana.

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care if people laugh at them. A real squid doesn't care about anything.
translation.es: A un calamar no le importa si la gente se ríe. No le importa nada.

translation.en: It rules the seas.
-We're standing by with the glitter. -Mmm-hmm.
-And go. -[breathes deeply]
Go. Go, go, go. Faster. Come on, faster.
translation.es: Ahora. Más rápido. Por favor, rápido.

translation.en: -[kids screaming] -[Ivy] Zuzu!
Come on, friendly squid. Help a whale out!
translation.es: ¡Vamos, calamar amigable, ayuda a esta ballena!

translation.en: [in French accent] No, no, no, no, no.
-[audience applauding] -[Bean] Squids coming through.
When I dance, my body and soul soars! [chuckles]
translation.es: "¡Cuando bailo, mi cuerpo y mi alma se elevan!".

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] The show must go on.
[Ivy] We're out! We're done! And we never have to go back on stage!
Or stand around in first position. We can do what squid do.
translation.es: Ni hacer la primera posición. Podemos imitar a los calamares.

translation.en: Giant squid versus whale!
[audience chanting] Squid! Squid! Squid! -Huh? -[audience] Squid! Squid! [clapping rhythmically] Squid! Squid!
Do they mean us?
-Squid! Squid! Squid! -Go, Squid!
-[chuckles] -Squid! Squid! Squid!
-[chuckling] -Squid forever!
-Brava! -Brava!
Encore! Encore!
You were right not to let them quit.
translation.es: Tenías razón en que no dejaran.

translation.en: Yes, but let's agree that they're quitting after this. Oh, thank God.
translation.es: - Pero dejarán después de esto. - Gracias a Dios.

translation.en: -[Bean] Yeah. -Three hundred people cheering for us?
I still can't believe it. We were the stars, Ivy.
translation.es: - No puedo creerlo. - Fuimos las estrellas, Eva.

translation.en: [Nancy] Bean,
all I can say to you two is…
You earned this.
And you earned this.
-Mom, I can get my ears pierced? -Mmm-hmm.
Why'd you change your mind?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué ahora? - Me convenciste hace tiempo.

translation.en: You convinced me a while ago, honey. I was just waiting for the perfect moment.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué ahora? - Me convenciste hace tiempo. Estaba esperando el momento perfecto.

translation.en: Twenty dollars, Ivy. Twenty! We're rich!
It's your money, Bean.
It's our money. You heard my sister, we earned it.
translation.es: Es nuestro. Mi hermana dijo que lo ganamos.

translation.en: So, what should we spend it on?
There's so many things we can do together. I've got some pretty good ideas. Don't you?
translation.es: Hay muchas cosas que podemos hacer juntas. Tengo varias ideas. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come.
-You saved the day. Come on! -[kids chuckle]
-[ballet student] Squid versus squid! -[ballet students] Go squid!
[Zuzu] Squids are the best!
[Travis] What are you doing, Bean? I'm making the Pit of Doom.
translation.es: - ¿Qué estás haciendo, Beba? - La fosa de la perdición.

translation.en: Wanna help? It'll be fun.
The only thing that's gonna fall in this pit is you.
translation.es: Lo único que caerá en esta fosa eres tú.

translation.en: -Why don't you ask the new girl? -[Bean] Ivy? All she does is read.
translation.es: - Invita a la vecina. - ¿Eva? Solo lee. En el recreo.

translation.en: -She reads at recess. -What's wrong with Bean?
translation.es: Solo lee. En el recreo. - ¿Qué tiene de malo Beba? - Corre y hace ruido todo el día.

translation.en: She just runs around and makes noise.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tiene de malo Beba? - Corre y hace ruido todo el día.

translation.en: Just wanna wash your uniform for you! [grunts]
You know the rules. Three strikes, you're out.
translation.es: Sabes las reglas. Si rompes tres, se acabó.

translation.en: I'm running away.
[whispering] Psst. Follow me.
[Ivy] I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.es: Aprendí un hechizo que te hace bailar para siempre.

translation.en: Mom wants you home now!
[Bean] Let's sneak through the backyards to creep up on Nancy and do the spell.
translation.es: Cruzaremos por el jardín y hechizaremos a Nancy.

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
No!
♪ Dance! ♪
Battement! Battement! Marching.
-[director] Cut! -[laughing]
